Healthy Eating Habits

Eating a balanced diet is essential for good health. Make sure to include fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins in your meals.

Nutrition Facts

  • Fruits and vegetables are high in vitamins and minerals.
  • Whole grains provide fiber and help with digestion.
  • Lean proteins are important for muscle health.
